mapper.insert: insert into kangbank_account(accountNo,accountName,issueDate,accountPass,balance,email,tel) values(#{accountNo},#{accountTypeVO.accountName},sysdate,#{accountPass},#{balance},#{customerVO.email} , (select tel from kangbank_customer where email =#{customerVO.email}))
mapper.select: select a.accountNo,t.accountName,t.accountType,a.issueDate,a.accountPass,a.balance,a.email,a.tel from kangbank_account a, kangbank_account_Type t where a.accountName=t.accountName and accountNo=#{value}
select minMoney from kangbank_account_type where accountName=#{value}
select accountNo, to_char(issueDate, 'yyyy.mm.dd') as issueDate, accountName, balance from KANGBANK_ACCOUNT where email=#{value}
